amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce funding level for the Denali Commission to the FY19 level.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Denali Commission to FY19.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 283 (Roll no. 538).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 283 (Roll no. 538).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
